title: Plz Rito help me (Honor)
body:
I'm Back! I played a decent amount of games in the past month after my 2 week ban (around 66 since my honor got unlocked), and Broporo told me this:

I've checked over your match history and recent honor changes, and it does look like it's taking a bit longer than usual but you ARE getting that honor exp. It might be a little slow if you've been getting honored by premades, which don't give you quite as much as being honored by a random teammate.

I'm just wondering a few things: 
**1. If I honor randoms over premades would I be getting more honor (regardless if they honor me back or not)
2. Is there any way I can be told if I am close to honor 1 :3
3. What are methods to regain the regular speed of honor xp gain?**

Thank you soooo much for responding to this (if you do at least :P)! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Ayyyyyy look who it is! Good to see ya again. I'll go through these one by one for ya...

- **1**: Honoring other people doesn't get you more honor I don't believe, but you *do* get a little boost if everyone honors someone
- **2**: Unfortunately I don't have this info tbh
- **3**: The best ways to rank up quicker is to make sure everyone is honoring someone to get that extra little boost, and remember that random teammate honors should be giving more than if someone on your premade honored you.
3.Is the same thing applied to random teamates i met more times? Like a random teamate honored me this match and in the next i met him again and he honored me again. Do i still get the bonus?
As long as he isn't in your premade, it counts for slightly more I believe.

Are you able to clarify about going from dishonorable to level one? Ive seen lots of posts about it but all it says in the guide is "put in clean games". Any additional info? (length of time, amount of games, etc).
